# Description of DataSchema variable

The description of harmonised variable is the following:

* Short name: `cvd_all`
* Variable label: `History of all Cardiovascular diseases`
* Variable description: `The participant has been diagnosed by one or more of the following conditions: angina, stroke, myocardial infarction, heart attack, coronary heart disease, congestive heart failure, heart murmur, valve disease, cerebral vascular disease`
* Domain: `Diseases`
* Value type: `categorical`
* Category coding:

**Code** | **Category Label**
-------- | ------------------
0        | No, the participant has not been diagnosed of any of these conditions
1        | Yes, the participant has been diagnosed by any of these conditions

* Category missings: 

**Code** | **Category Label**
----| ------------------
991 | CAPI/interviewer error
992 | Impute
993 | Disable to measure
994 | Not attempt/not done
997 | Does not answer
996 | Not applicable
997 | Refuse
998 | Do not know
999 | Missing



<!-- ########################################################## --> 
<!-- # Global variables -->
```{r global, include=FALSE, echo=F}
miss_values_vector <- c(991, 992, 993, 994, 997, 996, 997, 998, 999)
ds_label <- "History of all Cardiovascular diseases"
cat_label <- c("No" = 0, "Yes" = 1, "Missing" = 999, "Do not know" = 998, "Refuse" = 997, "Not applicable" = 996, "Does not answer" = 997, "Not attempt not done" = 994, "Disable to measure" = 993, "Impute" = 992, "CAPI interviewer error" = 991)
datafolder <- "../RData/"
#sing_idlist <- c()
```

## SHARE


### Wave 1

#### Study-specific variable description

| **Name** | `mi_ha` |`stroke`|
|-|-|-|
| **Label** | `Myocardial infarction or heart attack` |`Stroke`|
| **Table name**  | `mi_ha` |`stroke`|
| **Categories** | `0 = No`<br/>`1 = Yes` |`0 = NOT A stroke (cerebral vascular disease)`<br/>`1 = A stroke (cerebral vascular disease)`|
| **Missings** | `997 = Refuse`<br/>`998 = Do not know`<br/>`999 = Missing` |`997 = Refuse`<br/>`998 = Do not know`<br/>`999 = Missing` |
| **Description** |  |  |

```{r assign w1, echo=F}

load(paste0(datafolder,"w1/mi_ha.RData"))
SHARE_w1 <- tibble(id=mi_ha$id)
SHARE_w1$mi_ha <- mi_ha$mi_ha
rm(mi_ha)
load(paste0(datafolder,"w1/stroke.RData"))
SHARE_w1$stroke <- stroke$stroke
rm(stroke)

```

```{r local w1, echo=F}

vbl <- SHARE_w1$mi_ha
kable(Categorical_summary(vbl, missing_values = miss_values_vector)[3], caption = names(SHARE_w1)[2])
kable(Categorical_summary(vbl, missing_values = miss_values_vector)[1], caption = "Category")
ggplot(SHARE_w1, aes(x=factor(mi_ha))) + geom_bar(stat="count", width=0.4, fill="steelblue") + xlab(label(vbl)) + ylab("Frequency")

vbl <- SHARE_w1$stroke
kable(Categorical_summary(vbl, missing_values = miss_values_vector)[3], caption = names(SHARE_w1)[3])
kable(Categorical_summary(vbl, missing_values = miss_values_vector)[1], caption = "Category")
ggplot(SHARE_w1, aes(x=factor(stroke))) + geom_bar(stat="count", width=0.4, fill="steelblue") + xlab(label(vbl)) + ylab("Frequency")

```

#### Harmonisation algorithm

To compute `cvd_all` from the study-specific variable it has to be recoded as follows:

* `all 0 into 0`
* `some 1 into 1`
* `997 -> 997`
* `998 -> 998`
* `otherwise into 999`

**R script:**

```{r harmo w1}

# Categorical variable harmonization
SHARE_ds_w1 <- tibble(id=SHARE_w1$id)
SHARE_ds_w1$cvd_all <- rep(999,length(SHARE_w1$id))
SHARE_ds_w1$cvd_all[which(SHARE_w1$mi_ha==998 | SHARE_w1$stroke==998)] <- 998
SHARE_ds_w1$cvd_all[which(SHARE_w1$mi_ha==997 | SHARE_w1$stroke==997)] <- 997
SHARE_ds_w1$cvd_all[which(SHARE_w1$mi_ha==0 & SHARE_w1$stroke==0)] <- 0
SHARE_ds_w1$cvd_all[which(SHARE_w1$mi_ha==1 | SHARE_w1$stroke==1)] <- 1

```


#### Statistics of the new harmonized variable

```{r descript w1, echo=F}

vbl <- SHARE_ds_w1$cvd_all
kable(Categorical_summary(vbl, missing_values = miss_values_vector)[3], caption = ds_label)
kable(Categorical_summary(vbl, missing_values = miss_values_vector)[1], caption = "Category")
kable(Categorical_summary(vbl, missing_values = miss_values_vector)[2], caption = "Type of missing")
ggplot(SHARE_ds_w1, aes(x=factor(cvd_all))) + geom_bar(stat="count", width=0.4, fill="steelblue") + xlab(ds_label) + ylab("Frequency")

```


#### Validation

```{r crosstabulation w1, echo=F}

AfterH <- table(SHARE_ds_w1$cvd_all)
X <- c(
  sum(SHARE_w1$mi_ha==0 & SHARE_w1$stroke==0,na.rm = T),
  sum(SHARE_w1$mi_ha==1 | SHARE_w1$stroke==1,na.rm=T),
  sum((SHARE_w1$mi_ha==997 | SHARE_w1$stroke==997),na.rm=T),
  sum((SHARE_w1$mi_ha==998 | SHARE_w1$stroke==998),na.rm = T)
)
BeforeH <- c(X[1:4],length(SHARE_w1$id)-sum(X))
C <- rbind(BeforeH,AfterH)
colnames(C) <- c("all 0->0","some 1->1","997->997","998->998","otherwise -> 999")
kable(C)

```

## Summary of descriptive statistics of the harmonised variable accross populations and waves

Two tables are generated: 

1. Percentages of categories in each harmonised variable.

2. Frequencies and percentages of individuals with different trajectories. To avoid too large table, Only trajectories with percentages larger than 0.3 are shown.

**R script:**

```{r summ}

l.hds <- list(w1 = SHARE_ds_w1, w2 = SHARE_ds_w2, w4 = SHARE_ds_w4, w5 = SHARE_ds_w5)

for(name in names(l.hds)) {
  aux_object <- l.hds[[name]]
  label(l.hds[[name]][[2]]) <- label(aux_object[[2]]) <- ds_label # Text value assigned at the DS description, at the top
  l.hds[[name]][[2]] <- labelled(l.hds[[name]][[2]], labels = cat_label)
  aux_object[[2]] <- car::recode(aux_object[[2]], "miss_values_vector=NA")
  aux_object[[2]] <- labelled(aux_object[[2]], labels = cat_label[1:2])
  m_name <- paste0("SHARE_m_ds_",name)
  assign(m_name, aux_object)
  rm(aux_object)
}

t.hds <- frq(l.hds[[1]][2])[[1]][,c(1,2)] 
for (i in seq_along(l.hds)){
  t.hds[2+i] <- frq(l.hds[[i]][2])[[1]][,4] 
}
t.hds[13,] <- c("n", "sample size", 
             length(l.hds[[1]][[2]]), length(l.hds[[2]][[2]]) , length(l.hds[[3]][[2]]), length(l.hds[[4]][[2]])
             )
names(t.hds)<-c("val", "label", "w1", "w2", "w4", "w5")
kable(t.hds)

dbb <- merge(SHARE_m_ds_w1[,c("id","cvd_all")], SHARE_m_ds_w2[,c("id","cvd_all")], by="id", suffixes = c(".w1",".w2"), all=T)
dbb <- merge(dbb,SHARE_m_ds_w4[,c("id","cvd_all")], by="id", all=T)
dbb <- merge(dbb, SHARE_m_ds_w5[,c("id","cvd_all")], by="id", suffixes = c(".w4",".w5"), all=T)
names(dbb) <- c("id", "w1", "w2","w4","w5")
v.dbb <- paste(dbb[,2],dbb[,3],dbb[,4],dbb[,5],sep="")
f.dbb <- frq(v.dbb)[[1]][,c(1,2,4)]
kable(f.dbb[f.dbb[,3]>=0.3,])
```
